approveTokens(address,address).details: approve any token to the swapRouter. note this is calleable by anyone.

fetchUnhealthyAccounts(uint256,address).details: fetch the unhealthy accounts for the given vault

liquidate((address,address,uint256,bool).details: This function can be invoked by any one to liquidate the account and returns true if succeeds, false otherwise note This function takes liquidation params as input in which the amount can be      provided either inclusive/exclusive of offset

setOffsetPercentage(uint256).details: Function to set the offset percentage
